sqlMap.sql: a.id, a.name, a.genderEnumId, a.nation, a.educationEnumId, a.major, a.university, a.politicalEnumId, a.title, a.workDuring, a.mobilePhone, a.tele, a.workplace, a.position, a.cardTypeEnumId, a.cardNo, a.email, a.contact, a.address, a.zipCode, a.publishDesc, a.remark, a.picture, a.excellentEnumId, a.publishEnumId, a.excellentYear, b.description as cardtypedesc, c.description as educationdesc, d.description as genderdesc, e.description as politicaldesc, f.description as excellentdesc, g.description as publishenumdesc, h.description as excellentyeardesc
sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
,
from correspondent a, enumeration b, enumeration c, enumeration d, enumeration e, enumeration f, enumeration g, enumeration h where a.genderEnumId = d.enumid and a.educationEnumId = c.enumid and a.politicalEnumId = e.enumid and a.cardTypeEnumId = b.enumid and a.excellentEnumId = f.enumid and a.publishEnumId = g.enumid and a.excellentYear = h.enumid
and (
)
order by $orderByClause$
limit $offset$, $rows$
